Select the printer used for the cash reg: Select the printer used for the cash register.
Set the address for Nexo Print Server.
An error has occured while loading the p: An error has occured while loading the printer. Make sure the server URL is correct.
An unexpected error has occured while pr: An unexpected error has occured while printing.
An unexpected error has occured while re: An unexpected error has occured while retreiving the receipt.
Unable to find the requested cash regist: Unable to find the requested cash register.
Unable to retreive the receipt if no pri: Unable to retreive the receipt if no printer name and address is defined.
Unable to retreive the receipt if no printer name and address is defined for the opened cash register.
Wether or not the printing should be ena: Wether or not the printing should be enabled.
If enabled, will display the differnt ty: If enabled, will display the differnt type of payment used on the payment receipt.
Define what is the logo type.
If the Logo type is a shortcode, provide: If the Logo type is a shortcode, provide the shortcode here.
Provide the local Nexo Print Server 3.x: Provide the local Nexo Print Server 3.x address
Define the header for the left column: Define the header for the left column
Define the header for the right column: Define the header for the right column
This will always displays at the bottom: This will always displays at the bottom of the receipt.
